TopicTitle: Oh man, it's been a long while.

Articles.Content:
I haven't been on the forums for about a year now, I think I can say that I am back for the time being. I see the forum layout has had a bit of an overhaul. Looks quite good.

 

I can't wait to dive into some more KSP, I haven't touched it since the 1.0 update.

We really evolved after all this time! We're in version 1.0.5!!!!!
Isn't that awesome? The progress?
Welcome back,

1 hour ago, EuSouONumero345 said:

We really evolved after all this time! We're in version 1.0.5!!!!!
Isn't that awesome? The progress?
Welcome back,

Well, considerng how long it takes for SQUAD to release an update, I'd say that's great progress.
